text: Ujar District () is a raion of Azerbaijan. It is in the centre of the country. There are 32 villages and 1 city in Ucar. The largest communities are Gazyan, Mususlu and Garabork. There were about 77,900 people in 2009."Demographic indicators" The State Statistical Committee of the Republic of AzerbaijanThe name is from the Turkic word "Ucqar" meaning "remote". ==References== Category:Districts of Azerbaijan Category:Aran Economic Region
title: Ujar District
